Query: How to convert a m4a sound file to mp3?

Top-3 Similar Questions: au_95753: Convert lossless m4a to flac
ul_438927: Convert all found m4a to mp3
su_668766: Unable to convert m4a to mp3
Top-3 Scripts:
au_95753: sudo apt-get install ffmpeg

ffmpeg -i filein.m4a -f flac fileout.flac

ul_438927: find . -name '*.m4a' -print0 | while read -d '' -r file; do
  ffmpeg -i "$file" -n -acodec libmp3lame -ab 128k "${file%.m4a}.mp3" < /dev/null
done
